id.description: Unique identifier for the custom conversion.

account_id.description: Unique identifier for the Facebook ad account.

business.description: Information about the business associated with the custom conversion.

creation_time.description: Date and time when the custom conversion was created.

custom_event_type.description: Type of custom event triggering the conversion.

data_sources.description: Data sources related to the custom conversion.

default_conversion_value.description: Default value assigned to the conversion event if no specific value is provided.

description.description: Brief description of the custom conversion.

event_source_type.description: Type of event source triggering the custom conversion.

first_fired_time.description: Date and time when the custom conversion was first triggered.

is_archived.description: Flag indicating if the custom conversion is archived.

is_unavailable.description: Flag indicating if the custom conversion is unavailable.

last_fired_time.description: Date and time when the custom conversion was last triggered.

offline_conversion_data_set.description: If applicable, the data set for offline conversions.

retention_days.description: Number of days for which the conversion data is retained.

rule.description: Rules or conditions triggering the custom conversion.
